name: Jumping Jack Helicopter
description: A helicopter has ran out of fuel. Save the helicopter from crashing by placing clouds to give it a trampoline-like effect. You also have to avoid the rocks from hitting the helicopter which come at great speeds. You can also enjoy the backgrounds.  Full screen is recommended for better game-play. This game is also available on Google Play Store. In Google Play Store, you can have the opportunity to compete for the top of the leader board and also unlock achievements.
